title: So why does it say 31st maintenance when its down on the 30th?
body: Idk just thought it was weird and its been down for more than aprox. 3 hours and its just eh... It says 31st on the server page of the OCE website but its down on the 30th...

replies.body: Still down, shocking day to have a day off from work :(

It's probably just a type on the Server Status page, unless they're also planning some maintenance for tomorrow (which is unlikely). There was an announcement on the boards with the correct information, which Roguestoney has provided a link to.
